Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerServer, Entrance
public class Server extends Object implements Entrance, ControllerServer
Server creates the server, comunicate with controller and send to it data received from clients. It also comunicate with the proxy and send to it data elaborated by controller.

  • Constructor Summary

    Create proxy and start it.

    • lastSavedGame

      public List<Integer> lastSavedGame()
      Restore GameInfo from last saved game.
      Specified by:
      lastSavedGame in interface Entrance
      Returns:
      a List of integer where the first item is the number of players in last saved game and the second item if it's 0 last saved game is in not exert mode, if it's 1 last saved game is in expert mode.
      See Also:
      • Server
